version_description:
2 new powerful updates are here!

New Order Book mode - You can now toggle between the *Market Depth* mode and *Order Volume* mode in the Order Book screen. This powerful switching option will help you quickly identify and place the best liquid trades in the book.

iOS Widget - Now instantly access prices of coins on WazirX without even opening the app. Swipe your iOS home-screen to the right to access the WazirX prices widget! Use this widget to track prices quickly & frequently.

3 New powerful features to help you trade like a pro!

• Smart Order Indicator - You can now easily identify your own order in the Order Book screen. Your open order will show up with a dot next to it. Place an order and give it a spin now!
• In-App Order Notifications - Receive in-app notifications when your trades execute! No more stress from constantly staring at your order status :)
• App announcement inbox - Tap on the announcement icon at the top right to find the latest feature and news updates from WazirX. Yet another step to keep us closer to each-other and be India's most transparent cryptocurrency exchange!

3 New powerful features to help you trade like a pro!

• Smart Order Indicator - You can now easily identify your own order in the Order Book screen. Your open order will show up with a dot next to it. Place an order and give it a spin now!
• In-App Order Notifications - Receive in-app notifications when your trades execute! No more stress from constantly staring at your order status :)
• App announcement inbox - Tap on the announcement icon at the top right to find the latest feature and news updates from WazirX. Yet another step to keep us closer to each-other and be India's most transparent cryptocurrency exchange!

• Cancel & Modify - The next time you want to cancel an order to change the price, select this option. The order gets cancelled and we immediately open up the Buy/Sell form with all the earlier details pre-filled so you can place your next order at lightning speed!
• Referral Counter - Now see a count of the number of friends who have joined WazirX using your referral code. Go to app settings.
• Gearing up for new coins - The stage is all set to add our next set of coins without you needed to update the app! Stay tuned :)
Halloween's gone but some spooky bugs stayed on. All fixed now!
Lo and behold! iOS 13 support is ready.
